name: acritely software
body:
# Welcome to my GitHub Pages Site

###I have several for-fun projects here:


## EL/EN Converter
If you write in both Greek and English keyboards, you might often forget to switch them before typing resulting in a frustrating error. For example typing with the wrong keyboard selected could create 'ξθστ τηισ' instead of *'just this'* or *'den j;erv'* instead of *'δεν ξέρω'*. To solve this issue, simply run the AutoHotKey script in the background and simply press **ctrl-g** or **ctrl-shift-g** to switch between keyboards. No more deleting the last line you typed!


## HostFileSync
A python script to copy the host file from [someonewhocares.org](http://www.someonewhocares.org) and update your machine's local host file.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
